thread.title: Brad & Leslie Long
thread.title_full: France Off the Beaten Path reviewed by Brad & Leslie Long

author: Brad & Leslie Long
title: Brad & Leslie Long
text: Our 25th anniversary trip to the Loire in 2014 with Christy and Philippe was nothing short of FABULOUS! The accommodations were wonderful. The people were wonderful and the food was spectacular. While it is possible to get "tired of chateau tours", Christie makes sure that no one feels left out and that a long leisurely lunch at a cafe is just as important, because it's Your holiday. Having a Michelin start chef guide us through the cheeses of France and the hot air balloon ride over the Loire valley were highlights. This is a Must Do.
